Articles.Content:
I cant run my main save. It just freezes on the "Load save" page whenever I click on my main save. Pls help

Edit: I cant actually run missions and scenarios though. Its just my main save file that doesn't work...

Edited November 21, 2021 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
I had a dream where 1.11 and 1.12 were finally on console. Please
I regret that I am unfamiliar with this issue, but I have moved your post to the place where someone might be.

11 hours ago, Vanamonde said:

I regret that I am unfamiliar with this issue, but I have moved your post to the place where someone might be. 

Thanks

There is one thing i could do: I can make a new temporary save, which I can use until the next update comes. If my main one still doesnt work, Ill have to wait till 1.12 and use the same craft files as before with that one new function.
